title: mksubjdirs
description: A command-line tool to create subject directories.

subj_name.title: Subject Name
subj_name.description: Name of the subject directory to create.

mode.title: File Mode
mode.description: Set file mode (as in chmod), not a=rwx - umask

parents.title: Parents Flag
parents.description: No error if existing, make parent directories as needed

verbose.title: Verbose Flag
verbose.description: Print a message for each created directory

selinux_context.title: SELinux Context Flag
selinux_context.description: Set SELinux security context of each created directory to the default type
